title: I got demoted due to a afk please help

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: How can I stay promoted I have been silver 4 so many times only to get demoted due to afks or people who troll. How can I stay at silver 4?

replies.body:
Look at it this way: If you're not the one going afk or causing people to afk, then in the long run you're gunna get more free wins from afks than losses (4 other people on your team and 5 on the enemy team). Sometimes you lose because of an afk, thats just how it is. If you wanna climb focus on the games you can win, not the ones you cant.

p.s. from the match history you linked, you were losing lane and your team was losing the whole game anyway so an afk wasn't exactly the only reason you lost

You get demoted for more reasons then that.

Sure i'll give you there can be AFK's in the game, lets say 2 out of 10 games.

that still means 8 other games are on you.


if your duo, consider going solo, Duo Q is high risk low reward until you hit around mid plat range


High risk is:
you face harder opponents to even out the advantage.
you put your team in a position where they face harder opponents then they are used to
you risk the chance of you or your duo being in a position of not getting the roles your strong in.
you risk being demoted quicker if your at 0lp.

Low reward is:

Playing with friends (honestly if you want to play with friends consider making a 5s team)
your MMR spikes and drops harder.



Honestly going solo imo is the best option.

you learn to carry yourself and in time makes it so you can carry your team in any situation.
